articles.title: Chandrayaan-3: India lunar rover Pragyaan takes a walk on the Moon - BBC
articles.description: Chandrayaan-3's rover Pragyaan exits Vikram lander and takes first steps near the little-explored south pole.
articles.content:
India's Moon rover has taken first steps on the lunar surface a day after the country made history by becoming the first to land near the south pole.
Chandrayaan-3's rover "ramped down" from the lan… [+3627 chars]

articles.author: Ashleigh Furlong
articles.title: Masks, lockdowns, social distancing: ‘Unequivocal’ evidence that measures reduced COVID-19 spread - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: They might not be popular, but a major report shows combining these interventions can keep case numbers low.
articles.content:
Speedy implementation of a combination of measures such as face masks, lockdowns and international border controls, unequivocally reduced COVID-19 infections, a major review has shown.
